类 FileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Plays the role of writing JAR files at the given directory.
    作者:
    Yizhong Ding

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        public long write(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                  double length)
           throws ArtifactResolveException
        Write the InputStream as a file.
        参数:
        inputStream - The Jar file to be written on the disk.
        length - The length of the file.
        返回:
        return total bytes that has been written.
        抛出:
        ArtifactResolveException - throws an exception if write fails.

      • setOutputStream

        public void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
        Getter for setOutputStream. Indicates the output Jar file.
        参数:
        outputStream - input outputStream

      • getOutputStream

        public java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
        Getter for setOutputStream.
        返回:
        the outputStream instance

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
